creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Bird Effigy Pot,polychrome earthenware,Mexico Casas Grandes,XIIc. Red, black, and brown on cream slip, coffee bean eyes, upturned tail, parrot beak
text:
Paquimé (Casas Grandes)
Chihuahua, Mexico
Vessel in the Form of a Bird, 12th-13th century
Ceramic, pigment
The John R. Van Derlip Fund     83.90.2
title: Vessel in the form of a bird
